name: dwaynecrooks.com
description: The personal website for Dwayne Crooks.

scripts.build: npm run build:html && npm run build:css
scripts.build:css: npm run sass:development && npm run postcss:development
scripts.sass: node-sass --indent-type space --indent-width 2 --linefeed lf -o tmp --include-path node_modules/normalize.css --include-path node_modules/breakpoint-sass/stylesheets src/stylesheets/index.scss
scripts.sass:development: npm run sass -- --output-style expanded --source-comments --source-map true --source-map-contents true
scripts.postcss: mkdirp dist/stylesheets && postcss --local-plugins -u autoprefixer -u postcss-font-magician -o dist/stylesheets/index.css tmp/index.css
